The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.

- The top row has a single "X" in the third column.
- The second row has two "X" in the third and fourth columns.
- The third row is entirely filled with "X".
- The fourth row has two "X" in the third and fourth columns.
- The bottom row has a single "X" in the third column.
- All other squares are empty.
